description:
Aside from talents such as sucking and fucking cocks, getting bound in metal devices and being tormented with pain and pleasure, Annie has a special talent she would like you to see.
It involves high pressure blasts of bodily fluid, sort of like what happens with an over-boiling teapot or when a whale uses its blow hole.
Can you guess what her talent is? She tried to attack me with it during the shoot, but she only nailed my videographer and missed me. This brings the score on DB so far to cyd: 12 - models: 0. Keep trying ladies :)
title: Teapot
